cleaned_text: Distance degree programs for Adults & Professionals. Bircham International University - Adult Degree Programs Online. Doctor Ph.D. Degree - Natural Health Science Natural Beauty & Cosmetics via distance learning This Doctor Ph.D. Degree presents both ancient and modern secrets of beauty care using natural products. The objectives are to increase our understanding of beauty and cosmetics and to learn how to look and feel beautiful without spending a fortune. It depicts information on all available natural products such as shampoo, mouthwash, facial masks, lip gloss, cleansers and scrubs, creams and lotions, massage oils, and hair-care products.
